entry.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - Room 43M - 43S
entry.content:
May 23, 20:05 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 23/05/2023 14:10 UTC
End Time : 23/05/2023 19:51 UTC
Root cause :Our technical teams resolved the issue.
All the impacted servers are operational.

May 23, 16:31 UTC
Update - Most of the affected servers are operational again. Our teams are still working on the last one.

May 23, 15:09 UTC
Identified - Start time : 23/05/2023 14:10 UTC
Service impact : Some servers are unavailable
Root cause : Issue on a cooling module.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are working to restore the service.

entry.title: [SBG3][Dedicated Servers] - S322B02 - S326B06
entry.content:
May 21, 12:11 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 21/05/2023 09:55 UTC
End Time : 21/05/2023 11:27 UTC
Root cause : Due to an emergency electrical work, we lost some servers.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted servers are now operational.

May 21, 11:05 UTC
Identified - Start time : 21/05/2023 09:55 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in the racks S322B02 and S326B06 are currently unreachable.
Root cause : Due to an emergency electrical work in progress, some servers are currently out of service. The infrastructure of SBG3 and SBG5 is powered by the emergency power supply.
Ongoing actions : Work continues by the power supply team. Our technical teams are working to get the services back up and operational. We will get back to you when significant progress has been made.
